Author: Nitin Dahad
Article: As CEOs of the leading chip companies signed a letter to US President Biden urging him to prioritize funding for semiconductor manufacturing and research, the White House press secretary Jen Psaki said late last week in a press briefing that industry should expect an executive order to be signed within weeks. SIA represents 98 percent of the U.S. semiconductor industry by revenue.
